page.title: 17Biography Of Famous Artist
page.content: Mr.Evans has exhibited his masterpieces at various exhibitions. E.g.University of Wales,Cardiff(1981), Browse and Darby,London(1978).He has shared an exhibition for 7yrs.at the Royal Academy of Arts,London.In all he has exhibited in 47 different exhibitions. Mr.Evans has appeared in a variety of newspapers and magazines and has appeared on 12 T.V.and radio programmes including "Wales Today." Also Mr.Evans has designed 3 book covers and was featured in 1 book himself.In 1984 Mr.Evans was awarded Â£2,500 by the Welsh Arts Council for producing an art book consisting of pictures of paintings with appropriate captions. Mr.Nicholas Evans has led an extremely busy but fruitful role as an expert artist.
